sentences.english: I have visited many blogs of Sina lately, and my blog had some visitors.
sentences.chinese: 近来访问了很多新浪博客，同时也得到一些博友来访。

sentences.english: Create a treasure hunt with some blogging friends.
sentences.chinese: 和一些博友组建一支寻宝队。

sentences.english: Why did no one inform me of the change of plans?
sentences.chinese: 有劳博友告诉我正确的改法。

sentences.english: I want to know my readers further.
sentences.chinese: 我想进一步了解我的博友。

sentences.english: It's good to communicate with other bloggers.
sentences.chinese: 跟其他博友交流是很好的。

sentences.english: Local bloggers may squawk about content wanting to be free.
sentences.chinese: 当地博友抗议，要求线上读物免费。

sentences.english: Miss Trunk has had plenty of support from the blogosphere.
sentences.chinese: Trunk女士得到大量博友的支持。

sentences.english: Blogger Baobao, on the other hand, thinks she is a "child farmer" rather than a child slave.
sentences.chinese: 另一方面，博友“宝宝”则认为，她是一个孩农。

sentences.english: Then there are mutual exchanges between the Friends of Bo.
sentences.chinese: 再就是博友之间的彼此往来。

definition: friend from whom you can seek advice
Moments (social networking function of smartphone app WeChat 微信[Wei1 xin4])
to leave a message/to leave one's comments/message
to share (let others have some of sth good)
my unworthy manuscript (humble expr.)/my humble writing
